subject: RE: [junit] OutOfMemoryError
msgSnippet: this could be just a case of insufficient memory available to the jvm. you could increase the xms memory available through the command line to java...
messageBody:
this could be just a case of insufficient memory available to the jvm. you
could increase the xms memory available through the command line to java...
karthikeyan.r
